casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Anton CHRISTEN No. 38P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Anton Christen, for Christen, Anton. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 23rd of January 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Wake County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of January 2017 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of January 2017 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
